Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Bleed air leak detection. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
